articles.title: Six straight wins later — are the Patriots officially back?
articles.description:
New England heads into Week 10 on a hot streak — and confidence is rising. Tell us what you think.

The post Six straight wins later — are the Patriots officially back? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots secure six consecutive wins heading into Week 10, boosting local fan morale.
Team's resurgence increases playoff hopes, impacting ticket sales and local businesses positively.
Confidence rises among players and fans, fostering a renewed sense of community support.

articles.title: New UMass poll shows Markey with firm lead over Moulton
articles.description:
If other potential candidates like Rep. Ayanna Pressley were to enter the race, Sen. Ed Markey's reelection campaign could get a lot more difficult.

The post New UMass poll shows Markey with firm lead over Moulton appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: UMass poll shows Sen. Ed Markey leading Rep. Seth Moulton in the race.
Markey's lead could diminish if Rep. Ayanna Pressley enters the election.
Boston residents may face a more competitive Senate race in 2025.

articles.title: Mass. man missing after leaving hospital early Friday morning
articles.description:
Police said they are concerned for Leonard Mercury's wellbeing and "believe he may be in need of medical attention."

The post Mass. man missing after leaving hospital early Friday morning appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Leonard Mercury, a Massachusetts man, went missing after leaving the hospital early Friday.
Police express concern for his wellbeing, indicating he may need medical attention.
Residents are urged to stay vigilant and report any sightings to authorities.

articles.title: ‘We’re feeling that first-snow magic’: New England ski resorts delight in the season’s first snow
articles.description:
Several ski resorts have announced an opening date this month.

The post ‘We’re feeling that first-snow magic’: New England ski resorts delight in the season’s first snow appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: New England ski resorts are celebrating the season's first snow this November.
Several resorts plan to open by mid-November, attracting local skiers.
Boston residents can enjoy early winter sports and recreational activities.

articles.title: Trump administration says SNAP will be partially funded after judges’ rulings
articles.description:
It’s not clear how much beneficiaries will receive, nor how quickly beneficiaries will see value show up on the debit cards they use to buy groceries.

The post Trump administration says SNAP will be partially funded after judges’ rulings appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: SNAP funding will continue partially following recent judges' rulings.
Beneficiaries in Boston remain uncertain about the amount and timing of benefits.
Local residents may experience delays in grocery purchases due to unclear funding details.

articles.title: 5 new restaurants we’re excited to try in November
articles.description:
From a Florentine sandwich shop in the Back Bay to a Colombian-inspired steakhouse in West Roxbury, here are five new restaurants to check out this month.

The post 5 new restaurants we’re excited to try in November appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Explore five new restaurants opening in November across Boston neighborhoods.
Visit a Florentine sandwich shop in Back Bay and a Colombian steakhouse in West Roxbury.
New dining options aim to enhance Boston's culinary scene and support local businesses.
